paneladmina.adresurllogo: Enter the URL of the image:
paneladmina.modaltekstzmianalogo:
Logo in the format 1:1 (square) will be displayed best. To improve the speed of loading images is recommended to upload an image not larger than 200x200px. Supported formats are .jpeg / .jpg / .gif / .png.

In order to obtain the URL of images, you can use the hosting images such as:
  • imgur.com
  • imgsafe.org
  • postimage.io
  • tinypic.com


The image will be automatically scaled to the desired size.
paneladmina.uzytkownikdodany: User added successfully, save this data:
paneladmina.permisjetekst:
Different permissions give users access to perform specific actions on the site.

  • Moderator - have access to add comments, change the last location and the state of damage.
  • Administrator - has all the powers of a moderator, additionally got access to view the latest comments (on the main page), edit more information about the objects and can delete comments.
  • Super Administrator (owner) - It has all the powers of a moderator and administrator also has access to the admin panel, add and delete users, add and delete items, change the look of the page.
